SELECT count(*) FROM t_raw_material r
AND r.type = #{type}
AND r.name LIKE '%' || #{name} || '%'
AND r.is_deleted LIKE '%' || #{isDeleted} || '%'
AND r.parents_idx IS NULL

SELECT r.*, c.minor_name AS type_name, ci.minor_name AS unit_name, FROM t_raw_material r LEFT JOIN t_commoncode_item c ON r.type = c.minor_code AND c.major_code = 'MATERIAL_TYPE' LEFT JOIN t_commoncode_item ci ON r.unit = ci.minor_code AND ci.major_code = 'ITEM_UNIT'
AND r.type = #{type}
AND r.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND r.is_deleted LIKE CONCAT('%', #{isDeleted}, '%')
AND r.parents_idx IS NULL

SELECT r.*, c.minor_name AS type_name, qc.name AS qc_type_name FROM t_raw_material r LEFT JOIN t_commoncode_item c ON r.type = c.minor_code AND c.major_code = "MATERIAL_TYPE" LEFT JOIN t_qc_standard qc ON r.type = qc.type WHERE r.idx = #{idx}

SELECT r.*, cp.company_name AS clientcompanyname, cc.minor_name AS type_name FROM t_raw_material r LEFT JOIN t_client cp ON r.client_idx = cp.idx LEFT JOIN t_commoncode_item cc ON r.type = cc.minor_code AND cc.major_code = "MATERIAL_TYPE" WHERE r.parents_idx = #{parentIdx} AND r.is_deleted = 'N'
SELECT idx, name FROM t_raw_material WHERE is_deleted = 'N'
